            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制举行新闻发布会#</a>】今天下午，国务院联防联控机制召开新闻发布会，介绍做好疫情防控重要医疗救治设备促产保供工作情况，并答记者问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视新闻">@央视新闻</a> 全程直播↓关注！（总台央视记者乔全兴） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478769241117412:1034-video:1034%3A4478784871530547:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478769241117412:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67WbNTx" alt="http://t.cn/A67WbNTx" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/1375537944" usercard="id=1375537944">叶少侠soccer</a>：我们这些滞留在湖北非武汉地区的健康人员，已经配合居家隔离了四十几天了，无论是心理，身体及生活压力都到了一个极限了，我们回到工作地还有至少14天的隔离期，这样算下来一共最少隔离两个月了，这个换作任何人，都会有问题的。请逐步放行滞留人员，基层社区党组成员做好人员筛查工作，分批放行不难的        </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6626415327" usercard="id=6626415327">高虹洋</a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member3"></em></a>：我是一名普通的高中学生，面对疫情的突然到来和许多人一样手足无措，每天都关注着一线最新的消息，自己想出一份力却又无从下手。我同时也是一名音乐爱好者，所以我打算以音乐来传递思想来做出贡献，根据目前疫情当下，我原创了一首歌曲，我想反映出疫情面前老百姓最真实的一面，已上传微博主页望欣赏        </div>

                                <a name="4478767785074806" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix36OlibI?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 14:55" date="1583304914000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478767785074806:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 14:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%AF%8A%E7%96%97%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%83%E7%89%88%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎诊疗方案第七版#</a>官方解读来了！转存划重点！】3日，国家卫健委发布《新型冠状病毒肺炎诊疗方案（试行第七版）》。新版诊疗方案主要调整了以下内容：①<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E5%BD%A2%E5%8A%BF%E6%8F%90%E7%A4%BA%E8%AD%A6%E6%83%95%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#防疫形势提示警惕境外输入病例#</a>；②传播途径增加“应注意粪便及尿对环境污染造成气溶胶或接触传播”；③增加对孕产妇和儿童的临床表现描 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix36OlibI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478767785074806:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478767785074806&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

                                <a name="4478764149167360" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix30WCsQE?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 14:40" date="1583304047000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478764149167360:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 14:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC2%E4%BE%8B%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E4%B8%8D%E6%B6%89%E5%8F%8A%E4%BA%AC%E5%86%85%E5%B1%85%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#北京2例输入病例不涉及京内居民小区#</a>】3日，北京新增3例新冠肺炎，其中2例为自伊朗、意大利入境的输入病例，不涉及京内居民小区。1例为北京市本地病例，新发病例活动过的小区或场所为“丰台区东铁匠营街道南三环中路65号院”。确诊病例已收入定点医院进行救治，消毒工作已开展。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix30WCsQE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478764149167360:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478764149167360&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/Ix30WCsQE&amp;mid=4478764149167360&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gchw2g97w2j20go0gogvn" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>165</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                                <a name="4478753193448524" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix2Jhet7m?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 13:57" date="1583301434000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478753193448524:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 13:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A615%E5%90%8D%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#印度15名意大利游客确诊#</a>新冠肺炎】当地时间4日，印度官方发布消息，印度累计新冠肺炎确诊人数升至21人。4日有15名在印度旅游的意大利游客被确诊为新冠肺炎病例。目前印度共报告疑似病例438例，其中225人已完成医学观察，189人仍在观察中。（总台记者王建兵） ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478746528424825" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix2ywzlGh?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 13:30" date="1583299846000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478746528424825:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 13:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%851.2%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#中国境外累计确诊超1.2万例#</a>】目前，新冠肺炎疫情仍在多国持续蔓延。截至北京时间4日10：00，中国境外累计确诊病例已超1.2万例。中国境外新增新冠肺炎患者80%来自于韩国、伊朗和意大利三个国家，3个国家确诊病例已合计过万。一图了解新冠肺炎世界疫情形势↓关注！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%BC%9A%E7%BB%93%E6%9D%9F%E7%94%B7%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%E4%B9%9F%E4%BC%9A%E6%9C%89%23&amp;from=default">#疫情会结束男朋友也会有#</a>】继昨天<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%81%AB%E7%AE%AD%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E5%90%91%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E8%A6%81%E7%94%B7%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%23&amp;from=default">#火箭军回应护士向国家要男朋友#</a>之后，湖北武警小哥哥也表示：我可以！湖北“战疫”一线的护士小姐姐加油！愿早日凯旋，所有美好的心愿都能实现～<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478742782666032:1034-video:1034%3A4478350903672843:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478742782666032:2656274875" title="中国军视网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A679CDUF" alt="http://t.cn/A679CDUF" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>中国军视网的微博视频</a>（湖北武警） ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4478742782666032&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>21298</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478739759260058" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix2nBCQXM?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 13:03" date="1583298232000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478739759260058:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 13:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%99%E9%81%93%E5%BD%A9%E8%99%B9%E7%9C%9F%E8%B5%9E%23&amp;from=default">#这道彩虹真赞#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2311%E5%9C%B0%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD10%E5%A4%A9%E5%8F%8A%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#11地连续10天及以上无新增病例#</a>】3日，28省区市新增确诊病例数为0。其中，黑龙江、云南、陕西、海南、内蒙古、江苏、甘肃、新疆（含兵团）、贵州、青海、西藏连续10天及以上无新增确诊病例。戴好口罩，严防严控，不要放松！加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【海关总署：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%B5%B7%E5%85%B3%E5%85%B1%E6%A3%80%E5%87%BA75%E4%BE%8B%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E9%98%B3%E6%80%A7%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国海关共检出75例核酸阳性病例#</a>】随着疫情输入风险持续加大，全国海关对所有出入境人员严格实施100%查验健康申报，全面开展体温监测筛查。3日，海关采样检测和排查转运地方检出核酸阳性病例5例，其中上海4例、北京1例。截至4日零时，全国海关共发现入境有症状旅客6728人，其中疑似病例7 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix2cy3qRJ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478732900818259:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478732900818259&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%AF%8A%E7%96%97%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%83%E7%89%88%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎诊疗方案第七版#</a> 转存！】3日，国家卫生健康委发布《新型冠状病毒肺炎诊疗方案（试行第七版）》：①<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%90%E9%86%92%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%80%A7%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#提醒注意境外输入性病例#</a>导致的传播和扩散；②呼吸道飞沫和接触传播是主要传播途径，在相对封闭的环境中长时间暴露于高浓度气溶胶情况下中存在经气溶胶传播的可能。在粪便及尿中可分离到新 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix22ontqI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478726605594676:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478726605594676&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2328%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%23&amp;from=default">#28省区市确诊病例0新增#</a>】3日0-24时，天津、河北、山西、辽宁、吉林、黑龙江、上海、江苏、浙江、安徽、福建、江西、山东、河南、湖南、广东、广西、海南、重庆、四川、贵州、云南、西藏、青海、新疆（含兵团）新增确诊病例为0。3日8时-4日8时，陕西新增确诊病例为0；2日20时-3日20时，甘肃新增确诊 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix1J4cawT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478714622900415:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478714622900415&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%84%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A4%87%E6%A1%88%E6%9C%AC%E7%A7%91%E4%B8%93%E4%B8%9A1672%E4%B8%AA%23&amp;from=default">#各高校新增备案本科专业1672个#</a> 人工智能专业成热门】昨天，教育部公布2019年度普通高等学校本科专业备案和审批结果：各高校新增备案专业1672个、审批专业181个（含130个国家控制布点专业和51个目录外新专业），调整学位授予门类或修业年限专业47个，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%84%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E6%92%A4%E9%94%80%E6%9C%AC%E7%A7%91%E4%B8%93%E4%B8%9A367%E4%B8%AA%23&amp;from=default">#各高校撤销本科专业367个#</a>。新增备案本科专业名 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix1E7qcyB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478711556244801:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478711556244801&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E3%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A2%E4%BE%8B%E4%B8%BA%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#北京新增3例确诊2例为境外输入病例#</a>】3月3日0时至24时，北京市新增3例新冠肺炎确诊病例，其中2例为境外输入病例（1例为伊朗输入病例，1例为意大利输入病例），1例为北京市本地病例，均已送至定点医疗机构进行救治。报告新增疑似病例11例、密切接触者61人。截至3日24时，累计确诊病例417例，治愈出院 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix1CNB2vq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478710738827772:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478710738827772&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Ix1xAlNNc&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fcctvxinwen&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609495380&amp;ssig=f3Fy%2BpvASH" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478707505196294" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix1xAlNNc?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 10:55" date="1583290541000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478707505196294:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 10:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">

            </li>
        </ul>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609495389&amp;ssig=Gw9BEoDd90" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478704308459475" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix1sqzuH9?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 10:42" date="1583289779000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478704308459475:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 10:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%95%B0%E7%A0%B4%E5%8D%83%23&amp;from=default">#日本确诊新冠肺炎数破千#</a>】根据日本厚生劳动省今天上午的信息：日本的新冠肺炎感染者已达1000人。其中，日本国内确诊280例，包机从武汉接回14例，“钻石公主号”邮轮上确诊706例。（总台记者王梦） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【反超！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E6%95%B0%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%95%B0%23&amp;from=default">#武汉累计治愈出院数超过现有确诊数#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】截至3日24时，武汉累计治愈出院24890例，现有确诊病例22368例。武汉累计治愈出院数首次超过现有确诊数！继续加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                <ul class="clearfix">

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478696225798168" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix1fookmQ?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 10:10" date="1583287852000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478696225798168:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 10:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%99%A4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北除武汉外新增1例新冠肺炎#</a>】3月3日0—24时，湖北新增115例新冠肺炎，其中武汉114例。除武汉以外，湖北各地新增病例1例。网友：加油，期待湖北和武汉早日0新增！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%87%8D%E8%BF%94%E4%B8%AA%E4%BD%8D%E6%95%B0%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外确诊病例重返个位数#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外新增4例新冠肺炎#</a>】3月3日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例119例。其中，湖北新增确诊病例115例（武汉114例）。除湖北以外，各地新增病例4例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E119%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增119例新冠肺炎病例#</a> 其中<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E114%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#武汉新增114例新冠肺炎#</a>】3月3日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例119例，新增死亡病例38例（湖北37例，内蒙古1例），新增疑似病例143例。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病例2652例，解除医学观察的密切接触者6250人，重症病例减少 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix143bXMn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478689192851403:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478689192851403&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478682825600284" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix0TMnuTa?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 09:17" date="1583284658000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478682825600284:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 09:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A5328%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#韩国累计确诊5328例新冠肺炎#</a>】韩国中央防疫对策本部4日上午通报，从3日零时-4日零时，韩国共报告新增新冠肺炎确诊病例516例，累计确诊病例达5328例。新增确诊病例中，分别有405例和89例来自韩国疫情最严重的大邱和庆北地区。此外，新增死亡病例4例，累计死亡病例达32例。（总台记者唐鑫 李大杰） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！看百花报信唤新时】春风拂槛，百花争艳。沪上郁金香花团锦簇，八桂油菜花蝶舞蜂飞，还有赣黔玉兰李花在枝头绚烂。跟<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视新闻">@央视新闻</a> 直播，一起“云赏美景”！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478681114283227:1034-video:1034%3A4478756769693719:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478681114283227:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6703FCW" alt="http://t.cn/A6703FCW" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AF%BB%E6%89%BE%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%B9%B3%E6%B0%91%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#寻找抗疫平民英雄#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%80%80%E4%BC%8D%E5%86%9B%E4%BA%BA%E8%AF%B4%E8%A6%81%E5%9C%A8%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%88%B0%E5%AE%83%E5%85%B3%E9%97%A8%23&amp;from=default">#退伍军人说要在方舱工作到它关门#</a> 致敬！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】张登汉曾是一名武警部队的军人，退伍后已从事环卫工作11年。得知武汉江岸方舱需要一支突击队时，他第一时间报名，和同事们奋战5天5夜，将1000张床位铺设到位。清洁队中共有8名退伍军人，有的人还穿着曾经的军装。张登汉说：“集合时 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix0PM8Q6A" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478680342106920:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478680342106920&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【正在直播：赏花海看春耕&nbsp;&nbsp;<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%B0%8F%E7%9F%B3%E6%A6%B4%23&amp;from=default">#云守护小石榴#</a>】今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视新闻">@央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#共同战疫#</a>不间断直播将带来美、英国、日、韩等国疫情动态；带你看武汉华南海鲜市场、韩国首尔火车站消杀现场；实地探访支援湖北医护人员；看各地复工复课准备；早间云赏花海，看春耕春播；晚间一起守护小石榴…关注！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix0DXCEpq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478673019211800:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478673019211800&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7319660608" usercard="id=7319660608">怯懦者的盾</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%98%E8%96%87%E6%94%BE%E5%BC%83%E8%B4%A2%E4%BA%A7%E4%BC%98%E5%85%88%E5%88%86%E9%85%8D%E6%9D%83%23&amp;from=default">#甘薇放弃财产优先分配权#</a>还有个诈骗大户一样套路<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%8C%AF%E6%96%B0%E8%80%81%E5%A9%86%E5%BC%A0%E6%99%93%E6%95%8F%E4%B8%8D%E8%82%AF%E8%BF%98%E5%80%BA%23&amp;from=default">#张振新老婆张晓敏不肯还债#</a> 头顶“政府光环”，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%88%E9%94%8B%23&amp;from=default">#先锋#</a>集团庞大金融帝国为他人洗钱转移资产，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BD%91%E4%BF%A1%23&amp;from=default">#网信#</a>恶劣暴雷，血洗17万投资人上千亿资金，老总<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%8C%AF%E6%96%B0%23&amp;from=default">#张振新#</a>伦敦离奇病死，幕后黑手不详，在逃高管背景复杂，17万投资人奋起维权，金融不稳，国本何在？        </div>

                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Ix0s7kY3z&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478665674997421" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix0s7kY3z?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 08:09" date="1583280569000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478665674997421:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 08:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E7%A7%B0%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%E8%A6%81%E4%B8%8E%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织称中国防控经验要与世界分享#</a>】当地时间3日召开的世卫组织新闻发布会上，世卫组织官员称：“中国防控疫情的经验需要与世界分享，中国医疗专家组前往伊朗是一个极好的例子。中国专家亲临现场，与其他国家分享经验，这种直接的交流是我们最希望看到的，期待这样的交流越来越多。能由中国与其 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix0s7kY3z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478665674997421:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478665674997421&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E5%A5%A5%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E7%A7%B0%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%AC%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E5%B0%86%E5%A6%82%E6%9C%9F%E4%B8%BE%E5%8A%9E%23&amp;from=default">#国际奥委会称东京奥运将如期举办#</a>】当地时间3月3日，国际奥委会在瑞士洛桑召开执行委员会，国际奥委会主席巴赫表示，国际奥委会继续全力支持2020东京奥运会，并鼓励所有运动员全力以赴，继续为东京奥运会做准备。国际奥委会新闻发言人马克·亚当斯表示，基于现有证据，没有理由更改2020东京奥运会， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix0m3rODo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478661916629498:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478661916629498&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478658175490522" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix0g1n2kO?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 07:39" date="1583278781000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478658175490522:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 07:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【陕西安康将彻查“医院领导抗疫补助高于援湖北一线人员”问题】4日，针对网络反映安康市中心医院公示中存在“医院领导抗疫补助高于援湖北一线人员”的问题，安康市应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组召开紧急会议，要求安康市纪委监委迅速成立核查组，就网络反映的有关问题依法依规开展核查工作，做到公开 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix0g1n2kO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478658175490522:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478658175490522&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/Ix0g1n2kO&amp;mid=4478658175490522&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gchjvzez3mj20go0gogvn" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>563</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Ix0aboSQc&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609495389&amp;ssig=Gw9BEoDd90" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478654555930684" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix0aboSQc?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 07:25" date="1583277918000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478654555930684:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 07:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【世卫组织：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BF%87%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#中国境外新冠肺炎病例过万#</a>】当地时间3日，世卫组织发布最新一期新冠肺炎情况每日报告。截至欧洲中部时间3日上午10时（北京时间17时），中国境外共72个国家确诊新冠肺炎10566例，死亡共计166例。与前一日相比，中国境外新增新冠肺炎1792例，新增8个国家（安道尔、约旦、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix0aboSQc" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478654555930684:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478654555930684&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5717981248&amp;cid=4478655432328358&amp;nick=凯MrsL&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-4 07:28</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478648256374003" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix001qKav?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 07:00" date="1583276416000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478648256374003:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 07:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23ICU%E4%B8%BB%E4%BB%BB%E8%AF%B4%E4%B9%9F%E4%BC%9A%E5%AE%B3%E6%80%95%23&amp;from=default">#ICU主任说也会害怕#</a>：怕感染，也怕病人不给时间和机会】董芳，武汉市第三医院首义院区重症医学科主任。穿着防护服工作，汗水淹到鼻子……过去40多天里，她一直坚守一线。同为医生的丈夫也因救治患者感染上新冠肺炎，所幸扛了过来。她坦言：心底也会害怕，怕自己被感染，怕家人受伤害，怕病人不给时 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix001qKav" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478648256374003:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478648256374003&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478646620510236" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwZXo28JC?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 06:53" date="1583276026000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478646620510236:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 06:53</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%9E%E8%87%B32502%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊病例增至2502例#</a>】当地时间3日18时，意大利民防部门负责人、新冠病毒应急委员会专员安杰洛·博雷利通报：意大利累计确诊2502例新冠肺炎病例。其中，现存病例2263例，较前一天增加428例；死亡病例累计79例，较前一天增加27例；累计160例治愈，较前一天增加11例。意大利已对超过25800人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwZXo28JC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478646620510236:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478646620510236&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478545789561379" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwXkKE7lN?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 00:13" date="1583251986000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478545789561379:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 00:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%98%BB%E6%8C%A1%E6%AD%BB%E7%A5%9E%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E5%B7%A5%E8%82%BA%E5%B0%8F%E7%BB%84%23&amp;from=default">#阻挡死神的人工肺小组#</a>：用100%的努力换1%的希望】广东支援湖北荆州医疗队中有支“人工肺”（ECMO）小组，他们为危重症患者争取最后的时间。小组主管护师说，其他护理人员不敢轻易搬动ECMO病人，因一个转身，就有可能让连接颈静脉的管子脱落，让病人丧失抢救机会。人工肺小组的工作有多紧张、复杂？ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwXkKE7lN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478545789561379:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478545789561379&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478538541935620" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwX9487xG?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 23:44" date="1583250258000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478538541935620:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 23:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E8%BD%BD%E6%9C%891200%E5%90%8D%E4%B9%98%E5%AE%A2%E9%82%AE%E8%BD%AE%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%9C%E5%87%BA%E7%82%89%23&amp;from=default">#德国载有1200名乘客邮轮检测结果出炉#</a>】当地时间3日，挪威媒体报道，一艘载有1200名乘客的德国邮轮，因有两名乘客一周前与已确诊新冠肺炎病例有过接触，游轮暂缓离港。两名乘客下船接受检测，结果呈阴性。目前，该船将离开海于格松，继续行程。（总台记者郝晓丽 李长皓） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478530807270796" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwWWAuvsU?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 23:13" date="1583248413000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478530807270796:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 23:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E7%B4%A7%E6%80%A5%E8%B0%83%E6%8B%A860%E4%B8%87%E6%AF%AB%E5%8D%87%E8%A1%80%E6%B6%B2%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%23&amp;from=default">#四川紧急调拨60万毫升血液驰援湖北#</a>】今天四川支援湖北第二批血液启程。这批爱心血液由四川广安、遂宁、雅安、德阳、绵阳、南充6个城市组织企事业单位、社会团体和个人捐献，总计60万毫升均为悬浮红细胞，保质期在28至30天，预计今晚到达。未来，四川还将筹调第三批、第四批支援血液。点赞！（总台 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwWWAuvsU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478530807270796:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478530807270796&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=1159942895&amp;cid=4478531415333823&amp;nick=云淡风清yu&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-3 23:15</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478523786367305" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwWLgqIqt?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 22:45" date="1583246740000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478523786367305:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 22:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#主播说联播#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E4%B8%8D%E5%88%86%E5%86%85%E5%A4%96%E4%B8%80%E8%A7%86%E5%90%8C%E4%BB%81%23&amp;from=default">#隔离不分内外一视同仁#</a>】这几天有些省增加了输入性病例。当下新冠肺炎疫情已蔓延到70多个国家，中国之外的确诊病例数已突破1万。韩国、意大利、伊朗等国形势尤其严峻。据我们的防控经验，加强隔离是可行的办法。隔离不分内外，也不会区别对待，更不会有例外，只有一视同仁和严格执行。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwWLgqIqt" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478523786367305:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478523786367305&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4478518761523612" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwWDa6omo?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 22:25" date="1583245542000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478518761523612:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 22:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%852000%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊超2000例#</a> 疫情状况独家解读】截至当地时间3月2日18时，意大利已累计确诊新冠肺炎病例2036例，死亡52例。疫情最为严重的“红区”状况如何？总台记者带来独家解读，关注！（总台记者邓宗宇） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478518761523612:1034-video:1034%3A4478523977433115:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478518761523612:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67pUhjo" alt="http://t.cn/A67pUhjo" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4478518761523612"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>839</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4478518761523612&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li><a href="javascript:void(0);" node-type="" action-type="fl_historyEdit" action-data="mid=4478518077214996&amp;domain=100206&amp;is_ori=1&amp;can_edit_count=99" suda-uatrack="">查看编辑记录</a></li>
                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IwWC3ugWU&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609495396&amp;ssig=e6MRO6j4VU" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478518077214996" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwWC3ugWU?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 22:22" date="1583245379000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478518077214996:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 22:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E5%A5%A5%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%85%A8%E5%8A%9B%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%AC%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E4%BC%9A%E4%B8%BE%E5%8A%9E%23&amp;from=default">#国际奥委会全力支持东京奥运会举办#</a>：鼓励所有运动员继续做准备】当地时间3日，国际奥委会在瑞士洛桑召开执行委员会，会上听取了有关新冠病毒情况的报告。执委会表示，将全力支持东京奥运会在今年7月24日至8月9日期间举办。据了解，国际奥委会、东京奥组委、东京、日本政府及世卫组织于2月中旬成立 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwWC3ugWU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478518077214996:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478518077214996&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%A5%9E%E5%86%9C%E6%9E%B6%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%BA%E9%87%8E%E7%8C%AA%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E7%8C%AA%E7%98%9F%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#湖北神农架林区野猪非洲猪瘟疫情#</a>】今天，农业农村部发布，神农架林区阳日镇、松柏镇发生野猪非洲猪瘟疫情，共发现死亡野猪7头。当地已开展疫情处置和流行病学调查工作，对病死野猪进行无害化处理、消毒等处置措施，加强巡查，严格限制附近家猪放养，对周边所有生猪养殖户进行排查和全面消毒，并做 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwWxsFArM" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478515229911554:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478515229911554&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B2%A9%E6%9D%BE%E5%B8%AE%E4%BD%A0%E9%97%AE%23&amp;from=default">#岩松帮你问#</a>【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%99%BD%E5%B2%A9%E6%9D%BE%E8%BF%9E%E7%BA%BF%E5%90%B4%E5%AE%89%E5%8D%8E%E6%95%99%E6%8E%88%23&amp;from=default">#白岩松连线吴安华教授#</a>】传染病医院如何做好感染控制工作？医护人员如何做好安全防护？《新闻1+1》今日疫情分析，白岩松连线中南大学湘雅医院吴安华教授进行解读。关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478511051836278:1034-video:1034%3A4478517182922784:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478511051836278:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67pZyAX" alt="http://t.cn/A67pZyAX" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478507989663131" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwWlMExOX?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 21:42" date="1583242974000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478507989663131:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 21:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E8%AD%A6%E5%91%8A%E9%AB%98%E5%B3%B0%E6%97%B6%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E8%87%B41%2F5%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E5%8A%9B%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%23&amp;from=default">#英国警告高峰时可能致1/5劳动力感染#</a>】今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%23&amp;from=default">#英国首次发布防疫措施#</a>：①禁止举行人员密集大型活动；②鼓励人员在家办公；③如果疫情继续发展，一些学校可能会受到影响而关闭；④公立医院将召回新近退休的医护人员补充短缺人力。同时警告，疫情到高峰时期，英国可能会有多达五分之一的劳动力因病停 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwWlMExOX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478507989663131:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478507989663131&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

                    </div>
                </div>
                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

                                    <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5341988317&amp;cid=4478504097343780&amp;nick=春风十里不如你530v&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <!-- 回复 -->
                                <!-- 赞 -->
                                <li><span class="line S_line1">

                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-3 21:27</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#共同战疫#</a>【独家直播！意大利华侨华人搭乘航班飞抵杭州】今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E7%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%9D%87%E4%B8%BA%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#浙江新增7例新冠肺炎均为输入病例#</a>。今晚有两架从北京首都国际机场飞抵杭州萧山国际机场的班机，其上有30余名从意大利回国的华侨华人。看直播，关注防疫↓↓(总台央视记者高珧) <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478498683068635:1034-video:1034%3A4478510287224847:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478498683068635:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67NeGXD" alt="http://t.cn/A67NeGXD" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E7%B4%A7%E6%80%A5%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E8%B4%9F%E8%B4%A3%E4%BA%BA%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗紧急医疗组织负责人确诊新冠肺炎#</a>】据伊朗塔斯尼姆通讯3日报道，伊朗紧急医疗组织负责人皮尔侯赛因·科利文德新冠肺炎病毒测试呈阳性。目前该负责人已接受隔离。（总台记者倪紫慧） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                               【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"
